website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set with nice presentation.
pros: The rotating wooden carousel gives this set a great look on the table
A great way to organize and present the 11.5 gram clay composite chips
Set includes 200 chips in five colors

customer_reviews.title: Not Made of Wood
customer_reviews.text: It's possible there is wood somewhere in this item, but it's not where you would expect it, namely in the outer body of the carousel itself. Instead, it was immediately clear as soon as I removed the carousel from it's box that the outer body was covered in some sort of plastic, wood colored, wood patterned laminate. It's pretty brazen, because even the box it comes in says "Wooden Carousel" but there's no being fooled once you view and handle the item itself.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Mateus

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of junk! After filling e carousel ...
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk! After filling e carousel with chips, I went to move it and the whole bottom fell out! The tacks they used had no heads to hold the bottom in place. I had to glue the bottom, drill holes for some screws and free up the rollers so the damn thing would actually rotate. Now the carousel works properly. Very shoddy workmanship!
customer_reviews.author: ozzy6900

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged - beneath veneer is pressboard.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged - looked like water damage and so it was chipped and beneath the veneer was cheap looking pressboard. Too bad - because it looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Reader

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Handle/holder seems a bit flimsy, I'm worried the weight of the thing will end up pulling the handle right off, but so far so good. The chips are not the nicer 11.5g chips, the feel more like 8-9g or something, noticeably lighter, but better than plastic by far. Overall just okay. $40 isn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: shaneo

customer_reviews.title: Special Event and Club Meeting Chips
customer_reviews.text: Our use for the chips is to use different color chips designation which entree is ordered for our club luncheon meetings, This is an ideal, compact holder for many chips. We love using it and various color chips designating the different entrees is a perfect use.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic base with sharp protrusion
customer_reviews.text: The item is heavy. The cheap plastic base had a large sharp protrusion. My wife placed it on the dining room table and it left a large, ugly gouge in our beautiful table. So. I'm sending this piece of crap back to china.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, not wood and handle broke first time used.
customer_reviews.text: The carousel is plastic not wood. The handle is gold, not silver. The handle broke off the first time it was used. Not worth the price nor worth the effort to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nwtwn Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for the money. I love it. From people on a budget, or even someone looking for something high end, great buy for the money. This will work for years!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: In contrast to the picture, this carousel had a quite dated looking golden colored handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bluevanilladonkey

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great poker chip and card set. My family likes to play poker and this so easy to carry from our house to theirs with the carry handle. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: PokerChip Caddy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice to have stores all of your poker chips in one place and holds two decks of cards. Ready for that card game.
customer_reviews.author: Mech

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother-in-law, he's an avid poker player and really likes this item
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Spinetti

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic not wood, and broken plastic at that. Cheap gold handle, not silver as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great quality...love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! High quality and sturdy. Poker chips are not flimsy and love the carousel style. The whole set is great and it's made learning and having poker nights a lot of fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, solid product
customer_reviews.text: The chips are good quality. The holder is sturdy and spins smoothly and quietly. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: RBly

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. Was excited when he took it out, looked high quality until he noticed one of the chips holder is cracked on either side and chipped. The box itself was not damaged, so I did not inspect before wrapping. Returning and looking for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB724

customer_reviews.title: for playing at home
customer_reviews.text: it’s a great set to have to play with family and friends at home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you like the handle feature
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of the box to take to a dinner party with friends and held it by the handle (as one would think you could do with this product) and two different times the entire bottom just fell right to the floor, with the handle still in my hand. The mechanism for securing the handle is not secure at all, and completes defeats the purpose for having it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Casual at home poker/card players. I love that this is easy to put the chips away and holds cards, that are included. No complaints I think it's a great product and perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaCarol

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but goodie
customer_reviews.text: My dad has the same set which is still in good shape to this day. Wonderful product and durable
customer_reviews.author: Nora G

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality set
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in pictures on Amazon, but the material quality of both chips as well as the carousel set is really cheap. However, the biggest disappointment is that blue and green chips are so hard to tell apart since they look almost the same in most normal lighting conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bosh

customer_reviews.title: The was the wrong item!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item I requested and paid for was dark walnut and made of wood, this item is made of plastic and is black. Although the item came relatively quick, it's not what I wanted, nor was it what paid for and was delivered. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality set
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it came with 2 decks of cards. It’s a nice sturdy quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: The carousel is VERY nice!
customer_reviews.text: Chips are not very heavy weight, but they work okay. The carousel is VERY nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Baake

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The item was as described, and was very useful. A nice looking set.
customer_reviews.author: Birrski

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality product. Chips are substantial, not the flimsy plastic. Expect the carousel to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Gailee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered broken and was just terrible quality. The beads that are put inside to weigh it down spilled out all over the place because it was so terribly broken. Poorly made product and I’m very disappointed. Avoid purchasing!!
customer_reviews.author: Enjeen Woolford

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Made well just wish it an additional pair of chips the same color like the white, green, and red. We use them to play Sequence and not the intended use but the product is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Solid, professional looking.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and ready to play. I can't wait to use hold a party to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob SS

customer_reviews.title: Broken twice
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged twice ...and it looks like someone glued it together!!...i will not buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Good Wooden Carousel Case but bottom of turn table is cracked
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, but bottom of carousel was cracked. Other than that, everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect organizer for poker chips and cards and priced very well.
customer_reviews.author: Magfamily

customer_reviews.title: A great set! The chips feel natural and pleasant to ...
customer_reviews.text: A great set! The chips feel natural and pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brand

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner set, but wish I had just purchased a larger set.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a much nicer set than I was expecting. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Severs

customer_reviews.title: Fancy set smooth rotation
customer_reviews.text: Quite a fancy looking set. The rotation is pretty smooth so far (been 3 months). Chips might turn out scarce depending on the distribution so my suggestion would be to keep the denominations high.
customer_reviews.author: Hrishit Shah

customer_reviews.title: Not really impressed
customer_reviews.text: We had to fix the handle as it was broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Description is a lie. Product is not wood and does not have a silver handle as described. Arrived broken. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ian J Cable

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and reportedly a high quality piece. Quick shipping
customer_reviews.author: maggie wimhoff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The chips are nice quality, but the handle on the carousel is broken. Wouldn’t order again!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Durable and elegant dark wood poker carousel case
customer_reviews.text: This poker chip carousel is of solid wood, heavy weight chips and spins easily. Bought for my teenage boys who are rough with products and this carousel case is of solid and strong construction to withstand heavy use. Also very attractive dark wood color.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Lustbader

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated with mouse droppings
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in was full of what looked like mouse turds. They spilled everywhere when opened which ruined birthday dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Frod

customer_reviews.title: ... this product to be from my childhood when I enjoyed learning to play cards with the family
customer_reviews.text: Just as I remembered this product to be from my childhood when I enjoyed learning to play cards with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Not built the best.
customer_reviews.text: The handle likes to come off easily but doesn't want to go back on. Doesn't spin very well either.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Malone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This gift was perfect. I really wanted clay chips and these were great.
customer_reviews.author: JesTB1212

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Chips are good, the dispenser is very poorly put together. The screw in the bottom protruded and scratched the table plus the handle fell off. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: M A Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! when using the chips you feel like a "player".
customer_reviews.author: J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Chips ... let’s play!
customer_reviews.text: Gift . . . The handle needed to be tightened
customer_reviews.author: grizz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and of good quality
customer_reviews.text: The item was as described ...and of a sturdy weight ...not at all flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, quick delivery, I love it and use it. Good chips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: Great looking piece but the playing cards arent good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the carousel was not attached. It needs a new screw and had to be glued
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Emmert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: came broken I had to repair it as best I could
customer_reviews.author: Lou Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice made.
customer_reviews.text: The order came quickly & was exactly what was needed to complete a poker table. Nice made.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this when he opened it up in Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Vienna

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just as others have stated in prior reviews, mine arrived damaged and broken. A piece had been broken off and a sloppy attempt to glue it back on. Also, the bottom fell completely off when we took it out of the box. Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Danen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Item was as pictured. Arrived quickly. Very nice, sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: teresa hrubala

customer_reviews.title: Would choose another
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old son who likes playing cards. I pulled it out of the box for him Christmas morning and the bottom was detached. The stain was also splotchy. Really dollar store quality. We took out the bottom screw that goes through the rotating base and should have gone into the top, replaced it with a longer screw and it has held for now.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A Haviland

customer_reviews.title: Missing Cards!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice poker chip set. However, I bought this product for a birthday gift and was extremely embarrassed when they open the gift and both set of cards were missing!
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Soria

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not a new product...made in China
customer_reviews.text: Was not new (it was damaged, box was not). Very cheap, with mis-aligned colors. Amazon was great with return.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Poker Night Just Got Real
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my poker table. Very sturdy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N.

product_meta.title: Brybelly Poker Chip Set in Wooden Carousel Case, 11.5gm
product_meta.description: This 200 count 11.5 gram Suited Poker Chip Set in a wooden carousel in retail packaging is the perfect idea for brick and mortar stores. Unlike other poker chip sets, this one comes in retail packaging, creating a professional, high-end appearance. It will look great on your shelves and customers will enjoy buying an "all inclusive" package. The chips within this set each weigh 11.5 grams and are made from clay composite materials. The chip breakout includes 50 white, 50 red, 50 green, 25 blue and 25 black. Because the item is pre-packaged, the chips within this set ARE NOT eligible for a custom breakout. The wooden carousel included with this set is a stylish way to house the poker chips. Made of solid wood with a silver carrying handle, this carousel organizes your chips with into eight compartments, and has space for two decks of playing cards, which are also included with this set. The handle makes the carousel easy to transport and store. Ideal for any at-home game night or poker lover, this 200 count 11.5 gram Suited Poker Chip Set in a wooden carousel makes a great business investment.
feature_bullets: CASINO GAME NIGHT: Bring home the backroom feel of a classic card table with a set of 11.5g poker chips and revolving caddy
200 POKER CHIPS INCLUDED: Set comes with 200 Poker chips with classic coloration, for bets Low and High
THE ROOM IS SPINNING: Don't take a break in the action when you're cashing in. This revolving wooden carousel means your stake is always within reach
VEGAS MAGIC: Makes for a great family game night, tabletop gaming, friend hangout, and gambling game
COLOR ME UP: Includes 50 white, 50 red, 50 green, 25 blue, 25 black chips
